thread.title: Trevor Rose

author: Trevor Rose
title: Trevor Rose
text: I had a phone call to say when the tyre man was half hour away. He did a very thorough job and pointed out that my wheel was dented (from pothole) on the inside edge which I wouldn't have known (as you only see the outside edge). Advised me to get a new wheel and call to arrange for a tyre swap onto the new wheel. I would recommend tyresonthedrive for convenience and knowledge about tyres/wheels.
